subject: Invoice for Dryvco
body:
Please Note:

This is a remailing of a single invoice. If there are discrepencies between this and the previous emails, this email can be seen as up-to-date. These previous mailings happend on:

October 22, 2022 : 7:34pm

Hello Zehlm Web Development, LLC,

Here is the invoice for the work you have recieved.

Summary

Attached to this email should be 1 invoice for 1 job (Dryvco): for a total of $110.00.

Specific Note

Remail Comment

I fixed the bug that made the incorrect figures show up here. Here is a correct email.



Details


Dryvco: 1 invoice totaling $110.00


Invoice #2 for $110.00


As of the time of this mailing, your current outstanding balance is: $0.00



Thank You,
Web Apps Actualized

Do not reply to this email.

Replies to this email are not checked.

Contact Information

Phone: 336-406-1319
